about.family: My name is Vitor Bisterso dos Santos and I was born in 2002, Curitiba, Brazil. My father is an engineer, my mother is an english teacher and my brother will soon become an engineer.
about.uselessInfo: I've always liked sports and video games a lot! I also love dogs but don't own any :(

academic.cotuca: In 2016, I entered the Campinas' Technical High School (COTUCA) and started studying programming. After 3 years learning all about the IT world, I graduated as a programming technician.
academic.ifsp: In 2020, I started my bachelor's degree, studying Computer Science at the Sao Paulo's Federal Institute (IFSP-SP). This course is predicted to finish by the end of 2023 and, when I made this portfolio, I was in my first year of college.
